title: Slash
description: Ford Fischer faces a dilemma, slashed or be slashed.His quest for blade sobriety is side tracked when the slashers of Draper, Carolina are targeted from within their own ranks. With his mothers only complicating things, Ford finds himself spread thin between family matters and a slasher community in peril.Fischer’s tale is coupled with the tales of Sidnee Vincent, a horror novelist whose new home isn’t so sweet; Bravo Presley, a cannibal who’s doesn’t know the difference between lust and hunger; and teenager Maria Toledo who suffers the consequences of a childhood mistake that involved her swapping her soul for gummy bears.This 40,000 word novella is the first of a series that can only be described as mad.
author: Kevin Anthony
